_0comment: Hello! This is where the mods are registered. Just copy one of the preexisting mod registers and fill in your own information
_1comment: Please put any new mods near the top of the category for better reachability!

themes.name: Dusk Horizon
themes.author: Boxel
themes.description: A darker and more blended together theme

themes.name: Imagisphere
themes.author: Boxel
themes.description: WIP. (temp description) A little big planet theme.

themes.name: Orbit
themes.author: Afton
themes.description: Somewhat futuristic and clean textbox mod.

themes.name: Time Machine
themes.author: Boxel
themes.description: A theme that makes Sunkist Palace look like its older self.

plugins.name: Sugar Shaders Library
plugins.author: MaximusMiller2
plugins.description: [aka SSL] A library that imports cool filters for messages

plugins.name: EarthBound Backgrounds
plugins.author: MaximusMiller2
plugins.description: Replaces the background with randomized unique animated EarthBound battle backgrounds.

plugins.name: Absolutely No Styling
plugins.author: MaximusMiller2
plugins.description: Removes all styling & links except for mods. For use with mods.

plugins.name: Settings Menu
plugins.author: MaximusMiller2
plugins.description: Changes the settings and favorites to be a popup menu. Requires animated popovers.

snippits.name: Aligned Marketplace Buttons
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Aligns the subscription buttons to the bottom.

snippits.name: furry
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Replaces Boxel's pfp with her cat (which is objectively better).

snippits.name: Applesauce
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Replaces Boxel's pfp with her other cat (which is objectively betterer).

snippits.name: No favorites
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Removes the favorites divider.

snippits.name: Dark Menu
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: A basic dark version of the menu.

snippits.name: More Animations
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Animates some elements lacking in motion (Ex. User Messages fading in).

snippits.name: Userstyled Filters
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: (REQUIRES SugarShaders) Gives each user a unique and interesting backdrop-filter, as well as warping the menu.

snippits.name: VGUI
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Themes the menu based off of the beta Source Engine VGUI

snippits.name: Rain Rain Go Away
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Removes the rain gif that appears on some pages

snippits.name: Round PFPs
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Makes user profiler pictures round

snippits.name: Polaroids
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Gives images a white polaroid styled border

snippits.name: Unobtrusive Reply Button
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Hides reply buttons until you hover over the message

snippits.name: Cleaner Messages
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Declutters messages and reformats them, also spaces out messages sent from different users

snippits.name: Animated PopOver
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Animates the menus that are on top of everything. (like css menu)

snippits.name: Sunkist Logo
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: Turns the 'Sunkist's Palace' text on the title of the page into an image of the Sunkist Logo

snippits.name: Better Bottom Textbox
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Moves the textbox to the bottom along with the other menu items.

snippits.name: Compact Mode
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Squishes messages and disables identifier

snippits.name: Identifier Above Text
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: [Expiremental] Moves usernames and timestamps above user messages

snippits.name: Dusk Horizon TTAB Patch
snippits.author: Boxel
snippits.description: A patch to make Dusk Horizon work with TTAB

snippits.name: Traditional Textbox at Bottom
snippits.author: MaximusMiller2
snippits.description: Moves the textbox to the bottom for a more traditional look
